info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lea County through 530 PM MDT... At 441 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Lovington, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Lovington, Nadine, Monument, Humble City, Knowles, Lea County Regional Airport and Industrial Airpark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
